title: Fake News Detector (Jan 2025 – Present)
description: Developed a web app to detect and flag fake news using AI, NLP, and News APIs for content credibility analysis.

title: PawWalks (Oct 2024 – Dec 2024)
description: Built a React Native app for pet owners to book and connect with dog walkers, featuring real-time scheduling and tracking.

title: Travel Companion website (Jun 2025 – Sept 2025)
description: Developed in React using Google Maps and Rapid APIs to find nearby restaurants, hotels, and attractions with location-based filtering.
